name: Robert M. Berne Cardiovascular Research Center Reviews

review.title: “Educational work experience, learned a lot.”
review.pros: Pros – As a student, I was brought in contact with graduate students and scientists whom I would never have met otherwise.
review.cons: Cons – The only downside was the work environment was quite sterile, as a research lab should be. The environment was functional, not fun. It was obviously geared towards performing experiments and not so much on employee morale.
